name: Advanced Mineral Scanner
html: +5 to Intelligence (Investigation) checks when scanning a celestial body for minerals

name: Advanced Ship Scanner I
html: +1 bonus to Scan rolls

name: Advanced Ship Scanner II
html: +2 bonus to Scan rolls

name: Advanced Ship Scanner III
html: +3 bonus to Scan rolls

name: Advanced Ship Scanner IV
html: +4 bonus to Scan rolls

name: Advanced Ship Scanner V
html: +5 bonus to Scan rolls

name: Advanced Targeting System I
html: +1 bonus to weapon attack rolls

name: Advanced Targeting System II
html: +2 bonus to weapon attack rolls

name: Advanced Targeting System III
html: +3 bonus to weapon attack rolls

name: Advanced Targeting System IV
html: +4 bonus to weapon attack rolls

name: Advanced Targeting System V
html: +5 bonus to weapon attack rolls

name: Armory
html: Acts as a Weapon and Armor workbench for the purposes of installing equipment mods (weapons and armor). Downtime Activity - Crafting, Training (armorsmith’s workbench, tailor’s tools, tinker’s tools, weaponsmith’s workbench)

name: Auxillary Power Cells I
html: +1 range and +1 bonus to Restore rolls

name: Auxillary Power Cells II
html: +2 range and +2 bonus to Restore rolls

name: Auxillary Power Cells III
html: +3 range and +3 bonus to Restore rolls

name: Auxillary Power Cells IV
html: +4 range and +4 bonus to Restore rolls

name: Auxillary Power Cells V
html: +5 range and +5 bonus to Restore rolls

name: Crash Couches
html: When you succeed on a Hard Maneuver, characters on board your ship have advantage on their Constitution saving throw.

name: Exonet Array
html: Advantage on Investigation and History checks made while onboard. Downtime Activity - Practice a Profession, Research, Training (hacking tools)

name: Experimental AI
html: Starts as a level 1 NPC with a proficiency bonus of +2. When you take the Defer action in starship combat, add the AI's proficiency bonus to the roll. After a starship encounter, divvy up experience among all players and the AI. The AI's level and proficeincy bonus increases at the same rate of a player character.

name: Extended Fuel Cells
html: Your fuel capacity is equal to your ship's range multiplied by 6.

name: GARDIAN
html: Once per round, the GARDIAN system targets up to 4 transports within range (~1 km), dealing 250 (1d4[x100]) radiant damage to each target. This can also be used as a reaction to a torpedo or missile attack, immediately nullifying the attack.

name: GEB Mobius Algorithm
html: +1 to Harden and Sabotage rolls.

name: Luxury Kitchen.
html: When you roll a d6 to determine how many crew become disgruntled, subtract 1 from the roll. Downtime Activity - Training (brewer’s supplies, chemist’s supplies, cook’s utensils)

name: Medbay
html: When onboard the ship, players that expend a hit die on a short rest gain the maximum possible hit points. Downtime Activity - Practice a Profession, Training (medical kit)

name: Multi-directional Thrusters I
html: +1 Speed and +1 bonus to Maneuver and Hard Maneuver Rolls

name: Multi-directional Thrusters II
html: +2 Speed and +2 bonus to Maneuver and Hard Maneuver Rolls

name: Multi-directional Thrusters III
html: +3 Speed and +3 bonus to Maneuver and Hard Maneuver Rolls

name: Multi-directional Thrusters IV
html: +4 Speed and +4 bonus to Maneuver and Hard Maneuver Rolls

name: Multi-directional Thrusters V
html: +5 Speed and +5 bonus to Maneuver and Hard Maneuver Rolls

name: Multicore Shielding
html: +50 shields for each Milticore Shielding installed. Maximum 10.

name: Quantum Computing Processor
html: For each Quantum Computing Processor installed, gain an additional +1 to Harden and Sabotage rolls. You can have up to 4 QCPs installed

name: Rec Room
html: When you roll a d6 to determine how many crew become disgruntled, subtract 2 from the roll. Downtime Activity - Training (disguise kit, gaming set, musical instrument, painter’s supplies)

name: Thanix Cannon
html: Recharge (4-6). 2600 (4d12[x100]) lightning damage

name: VR Training
html: Downtime Activity - Training (any starship system, vehicles)

name: Weapon Range
html: Downtime Activity - Training in additional weapon proficiencies
